Introdução.Descrição: This 'drunken VIRUS' is not stronger than a sober and supportive country. We are an integrated and collaborative platform for ACTIONS and PROJECTS to fight COVID-19. Register your project here (IDEAS). Know the existing projects here (SOLUTIONS). Give your support (SUPPORT).

Cards.Descrição: Share HERE actions and products to fight COVID-19 for a better world.
Discover HERE innovative ideas you are looking for to fight COVID-19.
Give your support HERE to existing solutions to combat COVID-19.
